mapper.insert:
insert into fileUpload values(null, #{url }, #{comment },1,#{originFileName},1,#{userNo},#{projectNo})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select no, url, comment,chat_no as chatNo,user_no as userNo, origin_file_name as originFileName from fileUpload where url=#{url }

select project.no as projectNo ,project_name as projectName from user, crew_user, crew, project where user.no=#{userNo} and user.no=crew_user.user_no and crew_user.crew_no = crew.no and crew.no = project.crew_no order by projectNo desc

select fileUpload.no as no, fileUpload.url as url, fileUpload.comment as comment, fileUpload.origin_file_name as originFileName, chat.send_date as sendDate, fileUpload.user_no as userNo from fileUpload,chat where project_no=#{projectNo } and fileUpload.chat_no = chat.no order by no desc;
select count(*) from fileUpload where project_no=#{projectNo }
